Name: Dynatrace
Author: Dynatrace - microsoftalliances@dynatrace.com
Description: Detect Security Problems in your environment with the Dynatrace Security Problem Connector
WorkbookBladeDescription:
This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis, and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.
 Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Dynatrace/ReleaseNotes.md) 
 [Learn More about Dynatrace](https://www.dynatrace.com/) | [Dynatrace Docs](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help)
AnalyticalRuleBladeDescription: This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.
PlaybooksBladeDescription: This solution installs the following Playbook templates. After installing the solution, playbooks can be managed in the Manage solution view.
